resources.string: No Camera is detected, Please do the following actions to check: 1. Check whether the camera is connected correctly 2. Re-touch Auto Check, or manual setting camera type: Setting--Factory -- Camera and 360 panoramic set
If the reversing image is abnormal, please click the auto detect button!
The test failed, please re-detect or manually set the camera type in \r\nFactory Settings - Rear View and 360 Panorama Settings.
The reversing hardware has failed, please contact the dealer!
Saved successfully, exiting the reversing and re-entering the reversing will take effect!
